verses.verse: אֵל־ <WH410> 'el- God נְקָמ֥וֹת <WH5360> ne-ka-Mot to whom vengeance יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; O LORD אֵ֖ל <WH410> 'el belongeth O God נְקָמ֣וֹת <WH5360> ne-ka-Mot to whom vengeance הוֹפִֽיַע׃ <WH3313> ho-Fi-ya'. belongeth shew

הִ֭נָּשֵׂא <WH5375> Hin-na-se Lift up שֹׁפֵ֣ט <WH8199> sho-Fet thyself thou judge הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the earth הָשֵׁ֥ב <WH7725> ha-Shev render גְּ֝מ֗וּל <WH1576> ge-Mul, a reward עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto גֵּאִֽים׃ <WH1343> ge-'Im. to the proud

עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against מָתַ֖י <WH4970> ma-Tai How רְשָׁעִ֥ים׀ <WH7563> re-sha-'Im how long shall the wicked יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; LORD עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against מָ֝תַ֗י <WH4970> ma-Tai, How רְשָׁעִ֥ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im how long shall the wicked יַעֲלֹֽזוּ׃ <WH5937> ya-'a-Lo-zu. triumph

יַבִּ֣יעוּ <WH5042> yab-Bi-'u [How long] shall they utter יְדַבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> ye-dab-be-Ru [and] speak עָתָ֑ק <WH6277> 'a-Tak; arrogantly יִֽ֝תְאַמְּר֗וּ <WH559> yit-'am-me-Ru, boast כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> Po-'a-lei do אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> 'A-ven. of iniquity

עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha thy people יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD יְדַכְּא֑וּ <WH1792> ye-dak-ke-'U; They break in pieces וְֽנַחֲלָתְךָ֥ <WH5159> ve-na-cha-la-te-Cha thine heritage יְעַנּֽוּ׃ <WH6031> ye-'an-Nu. and afflict

אַ֭לְמָנָה <WH490> 'Al-ma-nah the widow וְגֵ֣ר <WH1616> ve-Ger and the stranger יַהֲרֹ֑גוּ <WH2026> ya-ha-Ro-gu; They slay וִֽיתוֹמִ֣ים <WH3490> vi-to-Mim the fatherless יְרַצֵּֽחוּ׃ <WH7523> ye-ratz-Tze-chu. and murder

וַ֭יֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-ru Yet they say לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor יִרְאֶה־ <WH7200> yir-'eh- shall not see יָּ֑הּ <WH3050> Yah; The LORD וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- Nor יָ֝בִ֗ין <WH995> ya-Vin, regard אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei neither shall the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

בִּ֭ינוּ <WH995> Bi-nu Understand בֹּעֲרִ֣ים <WH1197> bo-'a-Rim ye brutish בָּעָ֑ם <WH5971> ba-'Am; among the people וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים <WH3684> u-che-si-Lim, and [ye] fools מָתַ֥י <WH4970> ma-Tai and when תַּשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃ <WH7919> tas-Ki-lu. when will ye be wise

הֲנֹ֣טַֽע <WH5193> ha-No-ta' He that planted אֹ֭זֶן <WH241> 'O-zen the ear הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> ha-Lo not יִשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> yish-Ma'; shall he not hear אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- that יֹ֥צֵֽר <WH3335> Yo-tzer ;he that formed עַ֝֗יִן <WH5869> 'A-yin, the eye הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> ha-Lo not יַבִּֽיט׃ <WH5027> yab-Bit. shall he not see

הֲיֹסֵ֣ר <WH3256> ha-yo-Ser He that chastiseth גּ֭וֹיִם <WH1471> Go-yim the heathen הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> ha-Lo not יוֹכִ֑יחַ <WH3198> yo-Chi-ach; shall not he correct הַֽמְלַמֵּ֖ד <WH3925> ham-lam-Med ;he that teacheth אָדָ֣ם <WH120> 'a-Dam man דָּֽעַת׃ <WH1847> Da-'at. knowledge

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD יֹ֭דֵעַ <WH3045> Yo-de-a' knoweth מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <WH4284> mach-she-Vot the thoughts אָדָ֑ם <WH120> 'a-Dam; of man כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah they הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> Ha-vel. that they [are] vanity

אַשְׁרֵ֤י׀ <WH835> 'ash-Rei Blessed הַגֶּ֣בֶר <WH1397> hag-Ge-ver [is] the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom תְּיַסְּרֶ֣נּוּ <WH3256> te-yas-se-Ren-nu whom thou chastenest יָּ֑הּ <WH3050> Yah; O LORD וּֽמִתּוֹרָתְךָ֥ <WH8451> u-mit-to-ra-te-Cha him out of thy law תְלַמְּדֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3925> te-lam-me-Den-nu. and teachest

לְהַשְׁקִ֣יט <WH8252> le-hash-Kit That thou mayest give him rest ל֭וֹ lo מִ֣ימֵי <WH3117> Mi-mei from the days רָ֑ע <WH7451> Ra'; of adversity עַ֤ד <WH5704> 'ad Until יִכָּרֶ֖ה <WH3738> yik-ka-Reh be digged לָרָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> la-ra-Sha' for the wicked שָֽׁחַת׃ <WH7845> Sha-chat. until the pit

כִּ֤י׀ <WH3588> ki for לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor יִטֹּ֣שׁ <WH5203> yit-Tosh will not cast off יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo; his people וְ֝נַחֲלָת֗וֹ <WH5159> ve-na-cha-la-To, his inheritance לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor יַעֲזֹֽב׃ <WH5800> ya-'a-Zo. neither will he forsake כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against

צֶ֭דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek unto righteousness יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> ya-Shuv shall return מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> mish-Pat; But judgment וְ֝אַחֲרָ֗יו <WH310> ve-'a-cha-Rav, shall follow כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all יִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> yish-rei- and all the upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> Lev. in heart

מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- Who יָק֣וּם <WH6965> ya-Kum Who will rise up לִ֭י li עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- against מְרֵעִ֑ים <WH7489> me-re-'Im; for me against the evildoers מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- Who יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <WH3320> yit-yatz-Tzev ;[or] who will stand up לִ֝י li עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- against פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> Po-'a-lei for me against the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> 'A-ven. wickedness

לוּלֵ֣י <WH3884> lu-Lei Unless יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עֶזְרָ֣תָה <WH5833> 'ez-Ra-tah [had been] my help לִּ֑י Li; כִּמְעַ֓ט׀ <WH4592> kim-'At had almost שָֽׁכְנָ֖ה <WH7931> sha-che-Nah dwelt דוּמָ֣ה <WH1745> du-Mah in silence נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. my soul

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> 'A-mar-ti When I said מָ֣טָה <WH4131> Ma-tah slippeth רַגְלִ֑י <WH7272> rag-Li; My foot חַסְדְּךָ֥ <WH2617> chas-de-Cha thy mercy יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD יִסְעָדֵֽנִי׃ <WH5582> yis-'a-De-ni. held me up

בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> be-Ro In the multitude שַׂרְעַפַּ֣י <WH8312> sar-'ap-Pai of my thoughts בְּקִרְבִּ֑י <WH7130> be-kir-Bi; within תַּ֝נְחוּמֶ֗יךָ <WH8575> tan-chu-Mei-cha, me thy comforts יְֽשַׁעַשְׁע֥וּ <WH8173> ye-sha-'ash-'U delight נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. my soul

הַֽ֭יְחָבְרְךָ <WH2266> Hay-cha-ve-re-cha have fellowship כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> kis-Se Shall the throne הַוּ֑וֹת <WH1942> hav-Vot; of iniquity יֹצֵ֖ר <WH3335> yo-Tzer with thee which frameth עָמָ֣ל <WH5999> 'a-Mal mischief עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> 'a-lei- and חֹֽק׃ <WH2706> Chok. appointed

יָ֭גוֹדּוּ <WH1413> Ya-go-du They gather themselves together עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh against the soul צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik; of the righteous וְדָ֖ם <WH1818> ve-Dam blood נָקִ֣י <WH5355> na-Ki the innocent יַרְשִֽׁיעוּ׃ <WH7561> yar-Shi-'u. and condemn

וַיְהִ֬י <WH1961> vay-Hi has been יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh But the LORD לִ֣י li לְמִשְׂגָּ֑ב <WH4869> le-mis-Gav; is my defence וֵ֝אלֹהַ֗י <WH430> ve-lo-Hai, and my God לְצ֣וּר <WH6697> le-Tzur [is] the rock מַחְסִֽי׃ <WH4268> mach-Si. of my refuge

וַיָּ֤שֶׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shev And he shall bring עֲלֵיהֶ֨ם׀ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אוֹנָ֗ם <WH205> o-Nam, upon them their own iniquity וּבְרָעָתָ֥ם <WH7451> u-ve-ra-'a-Tam in their own wickedness יַצְמִיתֵ֑ם <WH6789> yatz-mi-Tem; and shall cut them off יַ֝צְמִיתֵ֗ם <WH6789> yatz-mi-Tem, shall cut them off יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [yea] the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our God
